mashed.desc1: You are kind, good-natured and always thankful. Potatoes don't get softer than this.
mashed.desc2: Likelihood to cry watching a show: very high
mashed.conclusion: bonus joke: why do nurses need red crayons? to draw blood

chip.desc1: You are sociable, fun-loving and active. You brighten up every social setting with your sense of humour.
chip.desc2: Most likely to piss people off with: a bad prank
chip.conclusion: bonus joke: what did the doctor say to his patient with a bladder infection? urine trouble!

fry.desc1: You are imaginative, creative and artistic. You know how to appreciate all things beautiful.
fry.conclusion: bonus joke: what do you call a handsome runner? dashing

tornado.desc1: You are in a constant state of worry and nervousness. A real emotional wreck.
tornado.desc2: Badly needs: a reminder to breathe
tornado.conclusion: bonus joke: what's brown and sticky? a stick

tater.desc1: You have an underdeveloped personality - a little bit of everything...
tater.desc2: Your greatest struggle: making a decision
tater.conclusion: bonus joke: why are celebrities so cool? they have many fans

hash.desc1: You are reliable, hardworking and punctual. Your perseverance brings you places.
hash.conclusion: bonus joke: why can't you hear the psychiatrist in the toilet? the P is silent
